query:
SELECT 
  g.playerId,
  g.teamId,
  COUNT(*) as goalCount,
  p.name as player_name,
  t.name as team_name
FROM goals g
JOIN players p ON g.playerId = p.id
JOIN teams t ON g.teamId = t.id
JOIN campaigns c ON g.campaignId = c.id
WHERE c.slug = 'besta'
GROUP BY g.playerId, g.teamId
ORDER BY goalCount DESC
LIMIT 10;
